file_content.text: Can't turn your back on anything around here without a Jawa walking off with it.
Yes? Any news about the thefts?
There was a Jawa controlling the droids remotely. He was responsible for stealing the holocams, but I got them back.
It was Jawas robbing you.
Ah, that explains it. Can't trust those little rats with anything that isn't welded to the floor.
Thanks for all your trouble.
Here. This should cover any expenses you encountered. Thanks for your help.
Thanks for your help, Master Jedi. I'll be sure to spread the word of how the Republic's helping us out.
Thanks for your help. I'll spread the word how the Republic's helping us.
The droids shouldn't put up much resistance.
Master Jedi! What an honor! You must know how rarely members of the order visit Anchorhead.
Good day, sir. I must say, having a few more soldiers strolling around looking intimidating could bring some much needed law and order to Anchorhead.
Well, we certainly get plenty of your type here, but I've heard good things about you.
Welcome to Anchorhead. I hear you're the type who's willing to do some favors in the name of a good cause.
Any chance you'd be willing to help out with a little law enforcement issue?
It's in everyone's interests to keep Anchorhead safe.
Of course.
Thank you. The Republic should be welcomed here for that attitude alone.
I've always wondered how the other half lives.
There's a chance....
Ahem... not quite as well as some others, usually.
What's the trouble?
Don't you have police?
We've got a militia, but we're better at fighting off Sand People than solving mysteries.
We've been having thefts around Anchorhead lately. Nothing violent, so we weren't going to do anything.
But now the thieves stole the same blasted equipment that was supposed to let us catch them. State-of-the-art police surveillance holocams.
These thieves will think twice about taking on a Jedi.
I will get them back.
I, uh, don't know how easily you'll intimidate these particular thieves, Master Jedi.
A guilty heart cannot hide from the Force.
I will find the thieves.
So I've heard, Master Jedi.
Do you want the culprits dealt with in the field, or returned to Anchorhead for trial?
I'll get these thieves.
Um, we just need the holocams back. And maybe make sure they won't be doing it again.
How much are those holocams worth, exactly?
State of the art, huh?
I can pay you a fair price for their return, if that's what you're asking.
There's a weird thing about these thefts--every time, someone has reported astromech droids in the area right before.
What do you know?
We've only got one lead. Every witness has reported two astromech droids in the area just before the thefts.
Someone's controlling them remotely, and I'm guessing we can trace the signal.
If you can find the droids around the city, you should uncover the control device--and with a little luck, whoever's responsible for this.
Beneath me. [Refuse quest]
I understand... the security of our poor city isn't worth a few minutes of your time....
Why does nobody nice ever move to Tatooine?
